name: BotParty VR
description:
Bot Party VR

BotParty VR is a Virtual Reality experiment that aims to compare 20 different interaction techniques to answer binary questions.

Requirements:

Requires an Oculus Quest/Quest 2 and Oculus Touch Controllers to function.

Additionally, if you wish to use the desktop version the headset needs to be connected to the PC using an Oculus Link Cable or Air Link.

Installation:

You can use SideQuest to install the APK to your headset directly. Todo this:

  1. Download SideQuest from  https://sidequestvr.com/download
  2. Side load the application into your headset using SideQuest's tutorials

Alternatively, you can run this application by running the Desktop executable (BotPartyVR_Desktop.zip) with your headset connected to your PC, however you won't be able to utilize any Hands interaction techniques.
